2005 Campbell, D. O. and P. Legault Nuclear magnetic resonance structure of the Varkud satellite ribozyme stem-loop V RNA and magnesium-ion binding from chemical-shift mapping. Biochemistry 44(11): 4157-4170.(12206388) NA VS ribozyme NMR structure of SL5
2007 Wilson, T. J., A. C. McLeod and D. M. Lilley A guanine nucleobase important for catalysis by the VS ribozyme. EMBO J 26(10): 2489-2500.(17464286) NA VS ribozyme G638 is critical for catalysis
2008 Lipfert, J., J. Ouellet, D. G. Norman, S. Doniach and D. M. Lilley The complete VS ribozyme in solution studied by small-angle X-ray scattering. Structure 16(9): 1357-1367.(18786398) NA VS ribozyme SAXS-deriverd structure
2010 Wilson, T. J., N. S. Li, J. Lu, J. K. Frederiksen, J. A. Piccirilli and D. M. Lilley Nucleobase-mediated general acid-base catalysis in the Varkud satellite ribozyme. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A 107(26): 11751-11756.(20547881) NA VS ribozyme A756 stabilizes leaving group

Legault The NMR structure of the II-III-VI three-way junction from the Neurospora VS ribozyme reveals a critical tertiary interaction and provides new insights into the global ribozyme structure. RNA 21(9): 1621-1632.(26124200) NA VS ribozyme NMR structure of the II-III-VI three-way junction
2015 Suslov, N. B., S. DasGupta, H. Huang, J. R. Fuller, D. M. Lilley, P. A. Rice and J. A. Piccirilli Crystal structure of the Varkud satellite ribozyme. Nat Chem Biol 11(11): 840-846.(14690435) NA VS ribozyme Crystal structure
2017 DasGupta, S., N. B. Suslov and J. A. Piccirilli Structural Basis for Substrate Helix Remodeling and Cleavage Loop Activation in the Varkud Satellite Ribozyme. J Am Chem Soc 139(28): 9591-9597.(28625058) 4R4V VS ribozyme Crystal structure

A Mini-Twister Variant and Impact of Residues/Cations on the Phosphodiester Cleavage of this Ribozyme Class. Angew Chem Int Ed Engl 54 (50): 15128-15133.(26473980) NA twister ribozyme Catalytic mechanism of Mini-Twister Variant
